title: LF Gold + Players for a Ranked Team (Must be serious)
body:
Looking for ADC and Top Laner for a ranked team.
Requirements:
- Must be Gold +
- Must be serious
- Have skype
- Be able to take a joke
- Have fun

replies.body: i can be your adc dude :D i play a lot , tell me your nickname, or add me, "cordellat" ,im looking for a team, i can play jungler adc or suport hight lvl
I past all requirements but don't have skype. I use Curse
